page.title: 09TREGONNING HILL TODAY
page.content: A building plot on the hill 40 years ago would have cost as little as Â£100 30 years ago. Today, the same plot would cost Â£15,000.One person who bought a plot decided to build his own house. When digging his foundations he found a{Quern.}This was a grindstone used around 500 _ 1000 B.C.. Grain was poured into a hole in the top of the stone and the stone was turned around, while lying on top of another stone. The owner believes that there must have been a settlement of some sort on the same site as his present house in the past. The owner of the house used to run a youth club 20 years ago for the local children but when these grew up and moved away there was nobody to replace them. In his own words," to all intents and purposes the village is now dead."
